alert.note: Alert for Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:17AM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Dan River at Paces...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at Dan River at Paces. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Low spots along routes 658 and 671 begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 24.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.3 feet on 12/30/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 230 PM EST.
